Guidelines: 1. A+ Content container box max width should be 770px.
2. Do not include external fonts. Nykaa uses its default font which is Source Sans Pro.
3. Do not include external CSS and plugins like Bootstrap, Material UI or any other.
4. Do not Include any Doctype, html, head, body, viewport, meta and script tags.
5. Do not Include any html, body and universal(*) css selector in style.

6. The class and id name should start with aplus.
Example: .aplus-container, #aplus-row etc.

7. html elements(like h1, p, span etc.) should use with parent elements in style
Example: .aplus-box p, #aplus-inner span
8. File size should be less than 1.5 MB(including images).
9. Individual image size should be less than 300KB.
